Text:
I recommend you enable software rendering for this one, fix enemies appearing as black rectangles, also smoother gfx rendering.
Here's how:
1. Copy the data folder you downloaded to sdcard/Android/data
 so it looks like this:
 /Android/data/com.sony.playstation.SLUS_00619/
2. copy the apk to your phone and install it.
3. open in a text editor "/Android/data/com.sony.playstation.SLUS_00619/files/ucc/.../preferences.xml"
4. Change "SW-render" value="false" to "true"

can someone help me? i have followed your instructions. but i don't see this file on my xperia "Android/data/com.sony.playstation.SLUS_00619/files/ucc/.../preferences.xml"... i mean i don't see the "ucc" folder in my phone.
Hej skulle du kunna ladda upp spyro spelen också jag har försökt fixa dem själv men jag får det inte att funka. Tack för denna btw ;)
I installed it prperly but i only get to the health warning screen the it shuts of. Help? i have an r800i and android 2.3.2
@VIVGCiconia we have the same model and the same OS for android. and we have also the same problem. i only see the warning sign and suddenly it's closed.

I got tired of fake cracks and I looked for an alternative.

I found this http://www.drakensang.com/?&aid=3546&invID=xbdebbdbjdjxcdebjjijixbaajfecxibgxbgdhxbaa

It is a great game, and is free, even more, it can be played in a browser.

It cooled my thirst of killing monsters.
I played for a month with my old graphic card, and the refresh was kind of slow, and I decided to get a new card. I HAD A BIG SURPRISE. tHE GAME IT IS 3D. it has a great scenery, especially in north with those waterfalls or blizzards. I suppose that diablo is 3d too, since it has the same hardware requirements.

Anyway, drakensang is a very good alternative for diablo. Maybe is better. I will know in a year when diablo will be cracked.

I would liked to pay for diablo, blizard has done good job and deserve to be payed, I promised that after I played for free diablo 1 and two, I will pay for the third, but the price is not affordable for me. It matches my income for a month. I can afford to get hungry for a month reducing with a third my expenses, but I cannot afford to postpone my bills.
